<S%H1>Moreover,<s%> my father, <S%H7200>behold,<s%> <S%H7200>yes,<s%> see the <S%H3671>skirt<s%> of your <S%H4598>robe<s%> in my <S%H3027>hand;<s%> for in that I cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H3671>skirt<s%> of your <S%H4598>robe,<s%> and <S%H2026>didn't<s%> kill <S%H3045>you,<s%> know and <S%H7200>see<s%> that there is neither <S%H7451>evil<s%> nor <S%H6588>disobedience<s%> in my <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and I have not <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against <S%H6658>you,<s%> though you hunt for my <S%H5315>life<s%> to take <S%H3947>it.<s%>
